org.synyx.messagesource

Interface MessageProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileSystemMessageProvider, JdbcMessageProvider

    public interface MessageProvider
    Interface for instances that are able to return a Collection basenames that are contained. For all these basenames getMessages(String) can be called to receive the messages.
    Author:
    Marc Kannegie√üer - kannegiesser@synyx.de

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<String> getAvailableBaseNames()
      Returns a Collection of basenames that can be used for getMessages(String).
      Messages getMessages(String basename)
      Returns a Messages instance containing all the messages for a given basename.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessages

        Messages getMessages(String basename)
        Returns a Messages instance containing all the messages for a given basename.
        Parameters:
        basename - the basename to receive Messages for
        Returns:
        the Messages of that basename

      • getAvailableBaseNames

        Collection<String> getAvailableBaseNames()
        Returns a Collection of basenames that can be used for getMessages(String).
        Returns:
        all available basenames
